title: Are you auditioning for K-pop? - Quora

response.answer_text: Though yet I'm thinking to bcz I'm good at dancing and singing and visuals are also ok so yes i will think of it later on bcz i have to complete my studies first so maybe 🤔 when I'll be 18 I'll audition I'm planning for big hit or either yg confused🤷‍♀ Can u tell give me any suggestions? Right know I'm just 13 😅so my answer is yesssss i will give my audition but later on i still have time 😊 Have a nice day:)
